scenario_text.value: Aw, I was just thinkin’ of Piemon, bro...

His orders were nuts! “Bring the sacrifices,
or go hungry.” “Destroy any who oppose us.”

But not a word of gratitude, no matter how
hard we tried. Man, did that bum me out.

I feel that... I was in such a funk, I even
started SMELLING funky!

Haha, Pied Piemon and the Funky Bunch.
Ain’t that a hoot.

But even though Piemon’s gone, we’re still
marching to the toot of his flute...

Tell me about it. We’re a buncha toadies,
through and through...

(I can’t really follow this, but it doesn’t
sound great...)

All weaklings like us can do is stick
together...
